rooms.Name: Entrance to Acme Acres
rooms.Description:
You have somehow managed to find the glorious land of Acme Acres...
Before you is the entrance to Acme Looniversity where all your favorite
cartoon misfits learn to be more devious!!!

rooms.Name: Courtyard of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
This is the courtyard right in front of the Looniversity, you see a large
fountain to the south, and the School is just south past the fountain...
Happy Learning!

rooms.Name: Fountain by the Courtyard
rooms.Description:
There is a large fountain here spewing forth fresh water, and spraying the
students who are hurrying to class!!  You see the school to the south...
To the east you see a nice shady spot to study!

rooms.Name: Steps to the Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You have stumbled onto the steps of the Looniversity, you see before you, the
steps of the great school which brought forth such greats as Bugs Bunny,
Elmer Fudd, Lord knows how he got a diploma!

rooms.Name: Study Break
rooms.Description:
This is the room to do all your pre-battle preparation, and or studying as
some of the students are doing and they are asking you to be quiet too!
How Rude!

ExtraDescs.Description: They have beautiful pink, blue, and yellow blossoms.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The doors to the school look a little contorted, perhaps its just you, or
maybe the fact they are cartoons and drawn that way, no matter...
You may enter through to the south or go back to the courtyard...

rooms.Name: Grand Hall of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You have entered the grand entrance hall of the school, you see students
racing to get to their classes, you hope you are not late as Principal
Yosemite Sam is not a kind and understanding soul!

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
It is a hallway as long as the eye can see, but you do see each classroom
and frantically start to look for your class!!!  To the east the hall
continues with more classrooms!

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The hallway continues east and west, but a classroom marked, Physics, lies
to the north, you wonder how tough this could be, then you see the instructor
Wile E. Coyote, GULP, you hope there is a curve!

ExtraDescs.Description: The massive gates look to be made of solid iron, and very impenetrable.

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The hallway continues, you can go east and west, and you notice another
classroom to the south, it is labeled the Home Ec. Lab
Prof. Taz will be waiting for you inside!

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The ever endless hallway continues to the east and west, there is also the
classroom to the north, labeled the Common Sense of Tooning class...
Prof. Elmer Fudd presiding, how this happened, we do not know!

rooms.Name: North-East corner of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You have made it to the corner of the school and can continue south or west.
To the south you can see more classrooms as well as to the west!

rooms.Name: East Hallway of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The hallway continues north and south and there are some more classes to the
south, you hope they will be as easy as the other classes were...a few students pass you and say Hi and slap your back, you feel foolish for some reason!

rooms.Name: East Hallway of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The eastern hallway is no different than any other hallway in the school
but you do notice another class to the west, labeled Speech...
Prof. Foghorn Leghorn is your teacher, again, we don't know how this happened

rooms.Name: South-East corner of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The corner of this school is kinda messy, you wonder why then you see that
this is the corner where Elmira tosses her pets when she is done with them!
You hope to GOD she is not around or is in class! Exits to the north and west!

rooms.Name: Southern Hallway of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You notice more classes to the west and a messy corner to the east!
You hear noise to the west as well...probably the cafeteria!!

rooms.Name: Southern Hallway of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description: The hallway is much the same as the rest, lockers, classrooms, and the cafeteria entrance is to the west!  You hear a lot of noise coming from that direction!

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Cafeteria
rooms.Description:
You see food smeared all over the windows of the cafe, it appears the good
Principal Sam has not been through here lately, and God save these poor
kids if he does, maybe you should pass on lunch today!

rooms.Name: Palace Walk
rooms.Description: You are on a walk made of sandstone leading north and south through town.

rooms.Name: Southern Hallway of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You catch a whiff of the lovely fragrance of the cafe to the west...you get sick
to your stomach, and pass out, BUT when you recover you can go west or east!
East, back the way you came, or west, to certain doom, errr the Cafeteria!

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Cafeteria
rooms.Description:
You notice food smeared all over the windows, it would appear the good Principal Sam has not seen this section of school today!
Maybe you should tell him, or flee before you get blamed!

rooms.Name: The Cafeteria of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
Food is scattered all over the place, you notice some of the students just
sitting by calmly eating their lunches, others are engaged in other
activities.  The special of the day...mystery meat...flee, save yourself!

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
Much the same as the other halls in this big establishment, long, filled with
lockers, and classrooms all about!  You also see a big room to the west, you
wonder what it is for?  What room could need to be so big!?

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You continue down the hallway and notice that huge room to the west seems to
be growing as you get closer!  You also see a classroom to the north!
Dirty Tricks to Play on Your Friends...Daffy Duck teaches this one!

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The hall continues east and west, but that room to the west has continued to
grow and you are beginning to fear what may be inside!  There is another
classroom to the south titled Porky's Etiquette and Charm Class 122!

rooms.Name: Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
You look and see there is another classroom to the north, this is the class
you have been waiting for, Bugs Bunny's Class on Wit, Sly Tactics, and all
Around Good Fun!!!!  His class is to the north, or there's east and west!

rooms.Name: North-West Corner of Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
The hallway is much the same as the others, but to the west you see the sign
for Detention!!  To the south is more hallway, slightly darker however, and
more craziness you assume!  The choice is yours, you could go back east too!

rooms.Name: Detention Room
rooms.Description:
There are enough seats in here to fill most college lecture halls, no wonder
it is so large, most the students from the school are here everyday as if
THIS were a normal class as well!!!  And they looked like such nice toons!
There is a desk here with writing on it which reads, Reserved for Max!

rooms.Name: Western Hallway in Acme Looniversity
rooms.Description:
It is very dark here, the hallway continues north and south, towards the south
You can slightly make out the resemblance of stairs, you hope they are stairs!
In this place there's no telling what it could be!

rooms.Name: Western Hallway in Acme Looniveristy
rooms.Description:
The hallway still continues north and south, to the north you know whats there
but you do not know what awaits you at the end of this hallway, but you can
almost make out the shape of stairs to the south!

rooms.Name: Stairs to the Principal's Office
rooms.Description:
These stairs seem to go up into the very atmosphere, but you know they go to
a much worse place!  The principal's office!!!!  Prepare yourself before you
enter, I hear the principal isn't know for his patience!!

rooms.Name: Portal to Cartoon and Disney Land(s)
rooms.Description:
There are portals, on all sides taking you to different areas of toonland!
You may enter the one with which you desire to visit now!!
Have a safe trip!

rooms.Name: Hidden Lair of the Anime Legends
rooms.Description:
A secret lair where the people at Warner Brothers sit and try to figure out
what makes Anime so damn popular and so they can duplicate it and make even
more millions off it.  All the legends of the screen stand here being looked
at by a producer or director of some kind.

rooms.Name: Room of Anime Legends
rooms.Description:
A continuance of the secret laboratories of Warner Brothers studios attempt
to steal the Anime market over here.  They have more guests from the famed
cartoons and are interrogating them tremendously.
I doubt some of them will take much more of this.

rooms.Name: A schoolyard
rooms.Description:
A schoolyard filled with children all dressed in uniforms and looking nice.
A certain group catches your eye however, a group with a large pudgy lil guy
a cute little girl and two distinctly different styles of students.  They
both look like they know their way around but one has a determination while 
the other has a look of drive and hatred that nothing will stop him from his
plans.

rooms.Name: Neo-Tokyo
rooms.Description:
A replica of the famed Neo-Tokyo where Akira is known to have destroyed the
entire city with a mere thought.  Akira was the most powerful telekinetic
force to ever hit the world, and he showed it.  He aided in the saving
of a young boy who had not yet mastered his powers, Tetsuo.  They with their
friend Kaneida stand here defiantly.

rooms.Name: Further into the Dark hallways of the Warner Brothers Anime files
rooms.Description:
As you continue down the hallway you see more doors and wonder who has been
hidden behind them for they are worn and slightly tattered about the hinges.
You wonder if now is a good time to get out of here before whatever is behind
the door senses you and bursts out of the room.

rooms.Name: A castle out in a field of future Earth
rooms.Description:
A time and place in the future when mutants have come about thanks to man's
desire to make more money and has killed the eco structure as we know it.
It has brought us mutants such as werewolves and vampires and the half-breeds
of both.  This is where you will find the more dreaded of all mutants, the
one they call D.  He is a vampeil, or half vampire, half human.  He is rumored
to come from the greatest vampire that ever lived or still does live, Dracula!

rooms.Name: A old japanese temple
rooms.Description:
An old japanese temple brought back to its glory by the power of the goddess
Belldandy.  She made the place brand new when her and the boy who accidentily
wished for a girl like her to be by his side forever when she offered him one
wish.  He later came to love the goddess and after the arrival of her sisters
they became a giddy little family.

rooms.Name: King of Fighters Tournament
rooms.Description:
A big arena is in this room and in the arena are some of the meanest fighters
the world has ever known, and they want to beat you to a bloody pulp!
You have often pondered life and what your purpose here is, but getting killed
by these monsters of incredible force was not it you are thinking.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Warner Brother Studios
rooms.Description:
As you stand before the great studios that have spawned the Lethal Weapon
series and such family greats as those wild and crazy cartoons you all know
and love.  You hope to get a glimpse of what is beyond the gate and maybe
see a movie being made, but to the north you notice a gate and a guard!

rooms.Name: The Gate to Warner Brothers Studios
rooms.Description:
The gate which seperates stardom from the hum drum of everyday life is what
lies here in front of you.  You see the guard post here that has a assortment
of snacks and goodies to be eaten but the owner seems to off somewhere, must
be an emergency for him to leave the post unguarded!

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio Lot
rooms.Description:
As you look upon the grand scape of everything here on this rather compact
studio, you still see the buildings where they actually shoot the movies
and you wonder if maybe you could get a sneak peek at a upcoming movie!
You decide against it as you figure you are in here against rules anyway,
best not to push your luck!  There are two studios, one to the east and
on to the west, the gate is to the south.

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio A
rooms.Description:
As you enter into Studio A of the Warner Brothers Studio you notice a face
that women die for!  Mel Gibson is standing over there, and he is as
studly as all the ladies remember!  This must be the new Lethal Weapon movie!
You wonder where that annoying little pest who played Leo Getz is!

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio B
rooms.Description:
You enter this studio wondering what star you might bump into, and in fact,
it is empty!  The Warner Brothers team must be slowing down a bit!  There is
some old movie props lying around but that is it.  This is a ghost studio
from what you can see!!

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio Lot
rooms.Description:
As you meander through the studios lot, you notice another studio north...
to the south is two studios and farther up north you see a huge water tower.
You wonder what could be in it, it looks far to old to be in use!

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio Lot
rooms.Description:
You look around and see a nice office building to the east, there is also
another studio to the west.  You can see that large water tower to the north
and to the south is more studios.  There are people running everywhere, they
must be getting ready for the big production number, when a explosion from
the nearby studio almost rocks you to the ground!  THAT is what they were
running from!

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio C
rooms.Description:
As you enter the studio it is filled with a dense smoke and a heat like you
have never experienced, as you enter you look around and see that some huge
bomb or explosive device has been triggered and you look to see what movie
it is.  As you scan the area you can see the director and the cameramen...
then while looking you see the star of the show...JEAN-CLAUDE VAN DAMME!!!

rooms.Name: Office Building of Warner Brothers Studio
rooms.Description:
As you enter the nice cool air conditioned atmosphere you feel relaxed and
feel you can look around and maybe get to talk with one of the big wigs
about getting you in a movie, after all you have fought a few battles.  You
have definately made a few stories that you could take pride in!

rooms.Name: Secretary's Office
rooms.Description:
A large wooden desk sits here with papers scattered and a cup of steaming
coffee on the desk.  You look for the owner of the desk to try and see about
getting an appointment with the director.
To no avail she must have just stepped out to get him something, maybe you
should wait, or maybe you could just walk in and talk to him.

rooms.Name: Hallway of the office building
rooms.Description:
As you have snuck past the secretary, you look for the door to the directors
office in the hopes of getting your story put on film so you can be a multi
millionaire and not have to run around killing things anymore.  You hear 
someone coming, you duck in a doorway.

rooms.Name: Hallway in a office building
rooms.Description:
As you continue down the hallway you notice two doors here...one labeled
Dr. Scratchinsniff, local psychiatrist.  The other is labeled 'Nurse'.
This is not the time you think for a mental examination, you have broke
into a movie studio, are galavanting around snooping through studios, and
now you want to have your life story made into a movie...your perfectly sane!

rooms.Name: Dr. Scratchinsniff's Office
rooms.Description:
You walk into the office looking for the good doctor, when instead you see
his couch and a nice comfy pillow on it, you can't resist!  As you lay back
and stretch out and enjoy the couch a voice from behind you says 'So! How
are you feeling today??' That has got to be the worst accent you have ever
heard!!  You begin to look for the exit before you have to kill him to get
him to shut up!!!

rooms.Name: Nurse's Station
rooms.Description:
You look around in this almost blinding white room.  This is the brightest
room you have ever seen it is almost to much until your eyes start to adjust,
that's when you notice the "hardware" of the typical nurse, you see the
degree on the wall and the obvious qualifications of the nurse on staff!
You hear a voice call from behind the door saying "Remove your clothes, I'll
be with you in a moment"  The voice was female...you get a little jittery
and look for the exit!

rooms.Name: Hallway in a office building
rooms.Description:
You have reached the end of the hallway.  You see a big door labeled Director
at last you have found what you have been seeking here.  You give a faint
knock, no reply, you knock again, nothing.  You wonder if anyone is even in
there, and so you decide to peep your head in the door to see!!

rooms.Name: Director's Office
rooms.Description:
You have stumbled upon the office of that director extrordinaire! Steven
Spielberg is here wondering what you want with him.  He looks over something
and you see a script in the corner that has dust and must not have made it
past the stage it is at right now...it looks to be labeled E.T. 2!!!
You better make it quick, he looks to be very busy!

rooms.Name: Warner Brothers Studio Lot
rooms.Description:
As you look through this part of the lot you notice that huge water tower
is directly to the north.  You can also see the Acme Labs to the west and
a road leading back behind the studios.  Where it goes there is only one
way to find out.

rooms.Name: Acme Labs
rooms.Description:
This is the laboratory of the great minds of the Acme company!  This is where
those genius' of young and old can get their hands on cool equipment!
It is also the home of those two lovable mice that plan for world domination!
You look around for them to see if they are still in their cage!

rooms.Name: Base of the Water Tower
rooms.Description:
You are at the base of a high water tower, it is yellow with the Warner
Brothers symbol painted on it way at the top you can see a wheel that
when turned looks like it could open the entire tower up!
There is a rusty ladder that goes up the tower and you can see it goes to the
very top, so if your feeling adventurous go for it!

rooms.Name: On the Water Tower
rooms.Description:
As you climb the tower you can see the whole lay of the land.  You see the
studios and all the people running around and you see that pudgy little
guard that you snuck by to get into the studio!  UT OH!! He sees you too!!
You better hurry up and get down before he gets some friends and comes
and removes you the hard way!

rooms.Name: On the Water Tower
rooms.Description:
You continue climbing and begin to get winded, both tired and you notice the
wind is picking up at this altitude!  You wonder what you will find up here
or maybe you can at least get a good vantage point to see the entire land!
You see the opening of the floor of the tower right above you, or you can
climb your way back down!

rooms.Name: On top of the Water Tower
rooms.Description:
As you reach the top of the water tower you can look out and see the horizon
and see the beginning and end of the day here.  It is a magnificent view, you
wonder why no one else ever comes up here to enjoy the view.  You then see
the wheel that once you turn the tower may be opened...you fear what may be
inside, maybe it DOES still contain water, who knows, turn it and see!

rooms.Name: Inside the Water Tower
rooms.Description:
As you look around inside the tower you notice toys and clothes and fur,
that's right FUR everywhere!  You continue to look around in the hopes of
finding what dwells in this mess, this chaos gone wild, and then, as if
an answer to your questions, you see...THEM!!!  THE WARNER BROTHERS!!!!
AND The Warner Sister!!!!  FLEE!!!!  FLEE AT ONCE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  CLOSE
THE DOOR QUICK!!!!!!

rooms.Name: Back Road
rooms.Description:
A back road around the back of the studio is what you find, you wonder what
could live out in these back woods, but you figure something will present
itself and if you have to you can defend yourself.  You pat your weapon just
to check it is still there.

rooms.Name: Back Road
rooms.Description:
You walk down this back road some more you see it continues to the north with
very little deviation.  It is a normal paved road, but why is it in the middle
of a movie studio???  Oh well, you look north and see farther down a big tree!

rooms.Name: Back Road
rooms.Description:
Moving along down the road you notice the tree to the north is a rather large
one with a mailbox in front of it, you wonder, who the hell has mail in a tree
you have begun to stop asking questions in this wild and crazy studio.

rooms.Name: Back Road
rooms.Description:
You can keep following the road to the north and to a pretty house, or you
can go west here and examine this tree a little closer.  You read the mailbox
and it reads Slappy Squirrel.  You begin to think this is a joke but stranger
things have happened to you on this studio!

rooms.Name: An Old Oak Tree
rooms.Description:
This tree stretches to the sky and opens up its branches as if to say HI!!!
Unfortunately the owner of this tree does not share its happy attitude!
You poor soul, you have stumbled upon the home of the crankiest of creatures
in the whole wide world, this is the home of Slappy Squirrel, a one time
famous cartoon star, now a old, cranky squirrel, she also lives with
her nephew Skippy...You better go before she drops a brick on you or something

rooms.Name: End of a Back Road
rooms.Description:
The back road dead ends abruptly here for some reason, there is a rather
nice house to the east, it is fenced in with a little blonde girl playing
in the yard and a dog watching the little girl carefully.  The gate appears
to be all that is holding the kid in, she is tearing around chasing butterflies

rooms.Name: Mindy's House
rooms.Description:
A big colorful house that appears to show the owners to be well off.  There
is a little girl here asking you "What'cha doin?" and then proceding to ask
you "Why" after every answer. GOD that is annoying!!  She exits proclaiming
"O.K. I love you buh bye!!!"

rooms.Name: A side room from the tournament
rooms.Description:
A shadow filled back hallway that seems to denote trouble around the bend and
if the competition in the ring is any indication maybe you would be best to
leave this area.  You hear someone laughing manically seemingly from all
sides that sends a shiver to the bone.  The walls seem to close in on you and
you feel very claustrophobic all of the sudden.  You hate the fear and you
want to find what is causing it and you see it...In the shadows to the right
you see a IMMENSE human being in a full coat of armor and giving off enough
energy and ki to make your hair stand on end.  He speaks to you, "Are you
Terry Bogard?"  You calmly state that you are not and he then says too bad
and says, "Entertain me" you fear his kind of entertainment!  Someone shouts
Krauser you are a fool leave these piddly insignificants alone and go find
Bogard!  At this the man in the shadows says to you, "Another time then."
You feel relieved.

rooms.Name: Geese Howard's Office
rooms.Description:
A huge spacious office with a nice window overlooking the King of the Fighters
tournament going on at this moment.  You look around and see that Geese is
a man of taste and has a large oak desk with a couple bookcases and a hidden
compartment in his desk springs open and scares you.  You look inside to see
a scroll wrapped up and as you unravel it to look at it, Geese
is upon you demanding you to join his cause as you must be good to get by
Krauser.  He doesn't like no by the way.  He cackles maniacally at your
refusal to join him and it seems to echo all over, now you know where that
came from earlier.  You feel humble before this great warrior who only seeks
to gain revenge on Terry Bogard for defeating him and placing the huge
scar on his chest as a permenent reminder of his loss.

rooms.Name: Further down the dark hallway
rooms.Description:
As you strain to see around you as the dark just seems to swallow every bit
of light like a shark swallows a fish whole.  You notice a odd little hole
placed on a pedastal here.  It looks to be about the size of a retangular
object.  You wonder what it opens, but since you have not found what could
possibly go there you just look around for another exit.

rooms.Name: A hidden room
rooms.Description:
A hidden room found only by using the necklace that Sulia carries around her
neck at all times.  It is where the story of her lineage is told and where the
mystical Armor of Mars and it's power is explained by the pictures on the
wall.  The pictures also demonstrate how the origins of both Terry and Andy's
fighting style began.  As well as Krauser's!  This explains why he
was so powerful, he was spawned in a lineage that had the Armor of Mars.
It is said that whoever controls all six pieces is the most powerful
human living and if you are a direct decendent of Goddemaus himself as
Laocorn and Sulia are, you will become a GOD.  There is one minor thing though
while you are staring at the pictures the guardians of the room are here.
They do not seem impressed by your being this close to their master.

rooms.Name: Deeper in the hidden room
rooms.Description:
As you stroll around looking at the other pictures in the room you notice the
detail and the storyline unfold more.  It shows Goddemaus ransacking villages
left and right being a immense ruler of the roman times and eventually 
causing the fall of the roman empire because he defeated Alexander to a
point that he never recovered and started the vicious downward spiral.
The power Goddemaus showed was unstoppable *CRACK* you turn and see someone
sitting indian style on the floor looking up at you.  He does not appear
pleased with you here, and looks to be the guardian of the room.  He is
taller if nto as tall as Krauser and seems to send out waves of energy
from the ground up.  You hope he is not the kind who shoots and asks questions
later.  He stands up and assumes a stance and attacks you full force!

rooms.Name: The chamber of the map
rooms.Description:
This is the room with the map of where all the pieces to the Armor of Mars
was buried, that's right, WAS.  It seems Laocorn has succeeded in attaining
all 6 pieces of the armor and he now plans to dominate the world.  You hope
your group is tough enough to stop him because he does not seem impressed
with your puny attacks and the fact your mortal flesh can only do so much.
He has surpassed humanity and become a GOD and now it appears you will be
the first to know what it feels like to have one beat you into a bloody
mess because here he comes!

rooms.Name: An open field in Japan
rooms.Description:
A wide open space with nothing but flowers and wide open spaces.  You feel 
the need to stretch out and languishly relax.  You look around and see a 
wierd looking warrior ranting and raving about how hungry he is.  He is
accompanied by a wierd looking bird creature with pointy wings that make
you wonder how the thing flies by itself, lil alone with a saddle on it's
back for the rider.

rooms.Name: Another form of tournament
rooms.Description:
Another tournament is being held here much like the King of Fighters version
but this one is involving all races of creatures from all over the galaxy.
It appears the contest has been narrowed down to two contestants and they
would not appriciate you interrupting them.  There is a square ring with 
a dragon looking female at one end and a short lil pointy eared demon at
the other.  They appear to mean business but if you know this anime show
you know it will not be without it's humor as well.

rooms.Name: Principals Office
rooms.Description:
This is the office of Principal Yosemite Sam!  He is the one who keeps the
peace in this school, if you have been summoned, begin praying now!  If you
have an appointment, take a seat and wait, if neither apply, WHY are you here?

rooms.Name: Bugs' Class for Humor, Wit, and Good Clean Fun!
rooms.Description:
You look around to see that this teacher loves his carrots!  There are pictures
 everywhere, and a box on his desk which looks like a cigar box but is labeled
Big Orange, picked fresh daily!  We know where his payment goes!

rooms.Name: Porky's Class for Etiquette and Charm 122
rooms.Description:
The classroom is remarkably neat and tidy, it will probably stay this way for
a long time too as this teacher is notorious for neat and cleanliness...
At least until Prof. Taz comes down and demolishes the place again!

rooms.Name: Daffy's classroom for Dirty Tricks 101
rooms.Description:
You look to see this room is filled with all kinds of devices that would be
most bothersome to rabbits, you wonder if this is going to be the focus of
the course.  He has many volumes of books on "How to Fool Your Friend"

rooms.Name: Foghorn's classroom for speech
rooms.Description:
As you enter you notice a big nest in the corner, prolly for his breaks,
there is also a big sign by the clock saying, Pay Attention Boy!
This looks to be boring...flee while you can!!!

rooms.Name: A basic classroom, with one minor difference, it has a old hunting rifle
rooms.Description:
This is a normal classroom, but judging from the way it is kept, it does
not bode well you will learn much.  There are several old posters of
rabbits and slashes through them...the teacher doesn't like rabbits!

rooms.Name: Home Ec. Class
rooms.Description:
You have walked into a classroom loaded with ovens and other kitchen items
There appears to be a cookbook out with a the page turned to Rabbit
Sandwich must be the chef's favorite, the book is half eaten though!

rooms.Name: Physics Lab
rooms.Description:
You just walk in and notice the Prof. has not yet made his appearance...
There are beakers a plenty, and blueprints for grand devices...and a
poster of a lil blue bird with a slash through it...
